column3: Sheesh; was that all this place had?
I figured the /speed:down/big; bad; /speed:init/Vampretti manor would be more exciting
Jax; what are you doing in here?

column1: -Jax turns to glance back at the scorpiee bodies and beams up at Zeffron.

column3: /speed:down/Oh; /speed:down/you know. /speed:up/A little /speed:init/exterminating.
Jax.
Alright; alright.
I snuck in because I was looking for the Book of Transference.
/select:1//move:-50/Look; I know what you’re gonna say. But I’m not stopping.
I’m finding that book; alright.
Easy; Jax. Take it easy./select:1//move:0/ I’m on your side.
Wait/move:-25/;
What? /move:-50/
Since when?/move:-75/
A lot has happened since we last saw each other. Now; come on.
Whoa; whoa. Hold on./move:-90/ What’s with the change in attitude? /move:-110/
You didn’t care about the book before. And what's happened.

column1: -Zeffron doesn’t move. He turns around forces the smile again.

column3: I think I understand why you left; and I just...
I dunno; I missed my brother./move:75/
/move:-25/Except; we're not brothers. Not really anyway./move:0/
Yeah; yeah. Now come on./move:0/ We’ve got work to do.
Now; for our next order of business;/select:0//move:275/ figuring out where the book is.
And just where do you think you’re running off to?
/move:0/The library; duh. This place should have one.

column1: -Zeffron shakes his head and hurries after him.

column3: And... why /move:175/would be heading to the library?
It's called hiding in plain sight.
Where else would a Vampretti hide a spell book?/move:275/
